coreAttributes.authorTag: The clothing's tag reads: 'Created by TonyJC, with implementation and editing by NeverLucky'
coreAttributes.name: denim overalls
coreAttributes.description: A one-piece made out of hardy denim. It's sturdy, and designed for continuous use.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the overalls from [npc.her] feet, fastening the straps over [npc.her] shoulders and buttoning them to [npc.her] chest.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the overalls from [npc2.her] feet, fastening the straps over [npc2.her] shoulders and buttoning them to [npc2.her] chest.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the overalls from [npc2.her] feet, fastening the straps over [npc2.her] shoulders and buttoning them to [npc2.her] chest.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc.her] chest, freeing [npc.her] [npc.arms] and allowing [npc.Name] to pull it down to [npc.her] feet and remove it.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc2.her] chest, freeing [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] and allowing [npc.Name] to pull it down to [npc2.her] feet and remove it.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc2.her] chest, freeing [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] and allowing [npc.Name] to pull it down to [npc2.her] feet and remove it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(button)] up [npc.her] top and straps, recovering [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] quickly [npc.verb(pull)] up [npc2.namePos] overalls without even bother to adjusting it for [npc2.her].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc.her] chest, allowing [npc.Name] to pull chest piece to expose exposing [npc.her] chest.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] away [npc2.namePos] straps and top down to hang loose, exposing [npc2.her] chest.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] down [npc2.her] top, letting it hang loosely and exposing [npc2.her] chest.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the overalls from [npc.her] feet, fastening the straps over [npc.her] shoulders and buttoning them to place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the overalls from [npc2.her] feet, fastening the straps over [npc2.her] shoulders and buttoning them to place
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the overalls from [npc2.her] feet, fastening the straps over [npc2.her] shoulders and buttoning them to [npc2.her] chest.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc.her] chest, freeing [npc.her] [npc.arms] and allowing [npc.Name] to pull it down to [npc.her] ankles.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc2.her] chest, freeing [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] and allowing [npc.Name] to pull it down to [npc2.her] ankles.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unbutton)] the straps on [npc2.her] chest, freeing [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] and allowing [npc.Name] to pull it down to [npc2.her] ankles.
